qa.question: Main Phone Use
qa.answer: WhatsApp, Snapchat, YouTube, Instagram, Google Meet, UPI banking, shopping apps.

qa.question: Phone Sharing
qa.answer: Rarely. Cousin plays games under supervision.

qa.question: Favorite Apps
qa.answer: Snapchat and YouTube. Aware of data collection but unsure extent.

qa.question: Permission Reading
qa.answer: Deny if unnecessary, allow if logical/popular.

qa.question: App Trust
qa.answer: Highly rated, many downloads, friends use, professional look.

qa.question: Content Deletion
qa.answer: Yes, delete private chats/screenshots from Snapchat.

qa.question: Phone Repair
qa.answer: Remove SIM, sign out banking apps, delete sensitive photos.

qa.question: Help with Problems
qa.answer: Ask tech-savvy friend, close chats/gallery first.

qa.question: Trusted People
qa.answer: Prefer in-person for sensitive info.

qa.question: Code Words
qa.answer: Yes, initials/emojis in chats.

qa.question: Helping Others
qa.answer: Helped aunt install Paytm, explained transactions but not permissions.

qa.question: Permission Control
qa.answer: Yes, disable in settings after learning from YouTube.

qa.question: Warning Messages
qa.answer: Uninstall immediately unless trusted.

qa.question: Access to Contacts/Photos
qa.answer: Think used for ads/friend suggestions, unsure about storage/selling.

qa.question: Repair Hesitation
qa.answer: Yes, prefer trusted service centers.

qa.question: Repair Person Behavior
qa.answer: Not known, but lock gallery/banking apps.

qa.question: Password Use
qa.answer: Fingerprint and pattern lock.

qa.question: Local vs International Apps
qa.answer: Trust international apps more secure.

qa.question: Tech Help
qa.answer: YouTube tutorials or tech-savvy friend.

qa.question: Social Influence
qa.answer: Friends advise on permissions/antivirus.

scenarios.Broken Phone: Backup, delete personal stuff, sign out, reset if possible.
scenarios.Sharing with Family: Hide chats, disable previews, take phone back quickly.
scenarios.New App with Permissions: Cancel if too many permissions, check reviews.
scenarios.Helping Elderly Relative: Install app, explain basics, set permissions for them.
scenarios.Cloud Backup Surprise: Surprised deleted photos stayed in Google Photos, learned to delete from cloud.
scenarios.Free Public WiFi: Avoid banking, use VPN if needed.
scenarios.Friend Needs Help: Confirm on call, careful with transactions, never share OTP.
